translations: 矛盾（contradict 的 ing 形式）；反驳；顶触

sentences.sentence: "Further contradicting conventional wisdom, we found that women as well as men have lower levels of stress at work than at home, " writes one of the researchers, Sarah Damske.
sentences.translation: “与传统观念进一步矛盾的是，我们发现，女性和男性在工作中都比在家里的压力小，”研究人员之一萨拉·达马斯克写道。

sentences.sentence: Further contradicting conventional wisdom, we found that women as well as men have lower levels of stress at work than at home.
sentences.translation: 比传统观念更加矛盾的是，我们发现女性和男性一样，在工作中承受的压力比在家里承受的压力小。

sentences.sentence: Paul, then, would seem to be contradicting Christ.
sentences.translation: 这样，保罗似乎否认了基督。
